title: Evaluation of the efficacy and safety of ramucirumab combined with nab-paclitaxel, lobaplatin, and S-1 in neoadjuvant and conversion therapy for advanced gastric cancer: A study protocol of prospective single-center, randomized controlled and open label clinical trial (RNPLS-01)
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Juan Wang, Guanghui Xu, Shushang Liu, Yuxuan Ma, Shu Wang, Mengbin Li, Yan Zhao, Haoyuan Wang, Yuhao Wang, Chaosheng Peng, Huade Huo, Haolin Li, Gang Ji, Jianjun Yang
